name: Machine Xpert
overview:
MachineXL and its ASPs provide a full range of support services in support of on-line monitoring systems, vibration and technology training, advanced machinery diagnostics, reliability improvement, problem correction and redesign.

Scroll down to see more details. _

On-line Systems Support Services Everything you need for an effective MachineXL On-line System Technology Training and Certification On-site classes in vibration and related technologies together with Vibra-Technica Advanced Diagnostics In-depth investigation of acute or chronic machinery and structural problems Problem Correction and Equipment Redesign Expert advice on correcting problems and correcting inadequate equipment design Reliability Improvement Support for all aspects of reliability improvement and asset life extension Application Service Providers (ASPs) Trusted providers of application, installation and operation services for MachineXL _

On-line Systems Support Services MachineXL, together with its Application Service Providers (ASPs), provides a full range of services in support of on-line monitoring systems, by experienced on-line condition monitoring consultants: Project Planning Assistance Pre- and post-sales support for on-line system design, including equipment identification, sensor location, cost estimation and task listing. Installation Supervision On-site support of contractor or in-plant personnel to ensure a quality installation of sensors, cables and other hardware first time. System Commissioning On-site hardware installation inspection and testing Software installation and preliminary system configuration Operational testing to assess operational readiness Baselining Preliminary setting or adjustment of alarms and data review Acquire baseline data for statistical alarm processing in the on-line system Online Monitoring Ongoing or periodic services by telephone/modem/internet/e-mail Full or partial remote operation of an online system, with regular reporting Interactive guide for in-plant personnel during early life of online system Support for plants without on-site condition-based maintenance program Periodic review and fine-tuning to ensure continuing success Product Training Public open invitation classes On-site, plant-specific classes Custom on-site classes combined with Technology training

Technology Training and Certification The following classes are offered on-site in association with Vibra-Technica. Call for information about setting up a class at your facility: Vibration Technology 4-stage Training and Certification Program Fundamentals of Vibration Basic Single Channel Applications Intermediate, Basic Multichannel Concepts Advanced - Advanced Multichannel Applications Custom Programs Related Technologies Balancing Alignment Root Cause Analysis

Advanced Diagnostics In-depth investigation and analysis of acute or chronic machinery and structural problems using sophisticated instrumentation and software: Multichannel Testing Modal Analysis Finite Element Analysis (FEA) Strain Gauge Testing

Problem Correction and Equipment Redesign Expert advice on correcting problems and correcting inadequate equipment design Vibration Control Finite Element Analysis of new designs and modifications Material and equipment recommendations Foundation and structure redesign Acceptance testing Test witnessing

Reliability Improvement Support for all aspects of reliability improvement and asset life extension: Root cause analysis Proactive maintenance Acceptance testing Specification assistance Failure defense planning Design support

Application Service Provider (ASP) A MachineXL ASP is a trusted provider of application, installation and operation services in connection with: MachineXL Online Condition Monitoring Systems Older MachineXpertÂ® On-line Condition Monitoring Systems Combined systems based on MachineXL or MachineXpertÂ® data acquisition hardware and MachineXpertÂ® or MachineXpert SQL(TM) On-line Condition Monitoring software.
